a:5:{s:1:"d";a:4:{i:0;O:8:"stdClass":10:{s:8:"slide_id";s:2:"24";s:7:"heading";s:67:"ERIA Ranks in the Top Ten International Economic Policy Think Tanks";s:10:"image_name";s:80:"/uploads/slides/eria-ranks-in-the-top-energy-and-resource-policy-think-tanks.jpg";s:10:"banner_url";s:117:"https://test-www-eria-org.azurewebsites.net/news/eria-ranks-in-the-top-ten-international-economic-policy-think-tanks/";s:13:"banner_target";s:6:"_blank";s:7:"content";s:430:"<h1 class="detail">ERIA Ranks in the Top Ten International Economic Policy Think Tanks</h1><p><strong>Jakarta, 29 January 2021: </strong>The Economic Research Institute for ASEAN and East Asia (ERIA) was ranked ninth out of 85 top International Economic Policy Think Tanks in the Global Go To Think Tank Index Report (GGTTI) conducted by the Think Tanks and Civil Societies Program (TTSCSP) at the University of Pennsylvania.</p>";s:8:"order_id";s:1:"4";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2022-10-31 02:51:17";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";}i:1;O:8:"stdClass":10:{s:8:"slide_id";s:2:"25";s:7:"heading";s:56:"ERIA Experts Discuss COVID-19 in Op-Eds and Publications";s:10:"image_name";s:48:"/uploads/slides/istock-1211970505-1200x510-4.jpg";s:10:"banner_url";s:83:"https://test-www-eria-org.azurewebsites.net/database-and-programmes/topic/covid-19/";s:13:"banner_target";s:6:"_blank";s:7:"content";s:178:"<h1><span style="color: rgb(118, 118, 118); font-size: 14px;">Click here to see all opinion articles and publications written by ERIA's researchers on COVID-19. </span><br></h1>";s:8:"order_id";s:1:"2";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2022-12-07 04:47:07";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";}i:2;O:8:"stdClass":10:{s:8:"slide_id";s:2:"28";s:7:"heading";s:71:"ERIA Supports Development of Framework for Circular Economy for the AEC";s:10:"image_name";s:89:"/uploads/slides/2021_october_eria_a-circular-economy-for-the-future-of-asean_1200x510.png";s:10:"banner_url";s:152:"https://test-www-eria-org.azurewebsites.net/news-and-views/eria-supports-development-of-framework-for-circular-economy-for-the-asean-economic-community/";s:13:"banner_target";s:6:"_blank";s:7:"content";s:645:"<h1 class="detail"><br></h1><p>ASEAN Economic Ministers adopted the Framework for Circular Economy for the ASEAN Economic Community at the 20th AEC Council Meeting on 18 October 2021. The Framework sets out an ambitious long-term vision for the circular economy, building on the strengths of existing initiatives, and identifies priority areas for action along with enablers, to realise circular economy in ASEAN. The Framework is a priority economic deliverable under Brunei Darussalam's 2021 ASEAN Chairmanship and was developed by the ASEAN Secretariat in collaboration with the Economic Research Institute for ASEAN and East Asia (ERIA).</p>";s:8:"order_id";s:1:"3";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2022-12-07 04:47:29";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";}i:3;O:8:"stdClass":10:{s:8:"slide_id";s:2:"30";s:7:"heading";s:39:"ERIA, INDONESIA'S G20 KNOWLEDGE PARTNER";s:10:"image_name";s:68:"/uploads/slides/2022_april_eria-indonesias-g20-knowledge-partner.png";s:10:"banner_url";s:88:"https://test-www-eria-org.azurewebsites.net/database-and-programmes/topic/g20-indonesia/";s:13:"banner_target";s:6:"_blank";s:7:"content";s:279:"<h1>ERIA, INDONESIA'S G20 KNOWLEDGE PARTNER</h1><p><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: sf_compact_textregular, arial, sans-serif;">Starting on: 30 October 2021, Indonesia officially assumed the leadership role of the G20 Presidency for the year 2022.</span><br></p>";s:8:"order_id";s:1:"1";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2022-12-07 04:47:44";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";}}s:1:"g";a:0:{}s:1:"e";O:8:"DateTime":3:{s:4:"date";s:26:"2023-03-07 09:22:05.183127";s:13:"timezone_type";i:3;s:8:"timezone";s:13:"Europe/Berlin";}s:1:"m";N;s:1:"c";N;}
